PRIVATE_OBA_API_KEY.description: OneBusAway API key for server-side requests

PRIVATE_OBA_GEOCODER_API_KEY.description: API key for the geocoding provider

PRIVATE_OBACO_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the OneBusAway.co API

PRIVATE_OBACO_SHOW_TEST_ALERTS.description: Whether to show test alerts from OneBusAway.co

PRIVATE_OBA_AGENCY_FILTER.description: Comma-separated agency IDs to restrict this instance to. Leave empty to show all agencies.

PUBLIC_NAV_BAR_LINKS.description: JSON object mapping navigation link labels to URLs

PUBLIC_OBA_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Google Maps API key (required when map provider is 'google')

PUBLIC_OBA_LOGO_URL.description: URL to the organization logo displayed in the nav bar

OBA_LOGO_URL_DARK.description: URL to the dark-mode variant of the organization logo

PRIVATE_MANIFEST_ICON_192_URL.description: URL to the 192x192 icon for the web app manifest

PRIVATE_MANIFEST_ICON_512_URL.description: URL to the 512x512 icon for the web app manifest

PUBLIC_APPLE_TOUCH_ICON_URL.description: URL to the Apple touch icon for iOS home screen

PUBLIC_OBA_MAP_PROVIDER.description: Map provider: 'osm' for OpenStreetMap/Leaflet, 'google' for Google Maps

PUBLIC_OBA_REGION_CENTER_LAT.description: Latitude of the region center for initial map view

PUBLIC_OBA_REGION_CENTER_LNG.description: Longitude of the region center for initial map view

PUBLIC_OBA_REGION_NAME.description: Human-readable name of the transit region

SHOW_REGION_NAME_IN_NAV_BAR.description: Whether to display the region name in the navigation bar

PUBLIC_OBA_SERVER_URL.description: Base URL of the OneBusAway REST API server

PUBLIC_OTP_SERVER_URL.description: Base URL of the OpenTripPlanner server for trip planning

PUBLIC_DISTANCE_UNIT.description: Distance unit preference; auto-detects from browser if empty

PUBLIC_CALENDAR_FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK.description: First day of the week for calendar (0=MON, 1=TUE, ..., 6=SUN)

COLOR_BRAND_PRIMARY.description: Nav bar background and primary button color (hex)

COLOR_BRAND_ACCENT.description: Links, selected states, and focus ring color (hex)

PUBLIC_ANALYTICS_API_HOST.description: API host URL for analytics events

PUBLIC_LANGUAGE_SWITCHER_ENABLED.description: Whether to show the language switcher in the navigation bar

PUBLIC_LANGUAGE_SWITCHER_BUTTON_FORMAT.description: Display format for the language switcher button

PUBLIC_LANGUAGE_SWITCHER_MENU_FORMAT.description: Display format for the language switcher dropdown menu
